title: Synergistic effect by supported activated carbon between functional groups and metal oxygen vacancies: Enhancing Ibuprofen degradation by improving ozone mass transfer
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00244J, Paper
Junda Lai, Zizheng Huangfu, Jiewen Xiao, Zhenbei Wang, Yatao Liu, Chen Li, Fan Li, Yunhan Jia, Qiang Wang, Fei Qi, Amir Ikhlaq, Jolanta Kumirska, Ewa Siedlecka, Oksana Ismailova
Catalytic ozonation is an effective method for wastewater purification. However, the low transfer of ozone in packed bubble columns leads to low ozone utilization efficiency, limited organic degradation, and high...
